traceabilityPage.title: Product Traceability
traceabilityPage.description: Trace the journey of your food from farm to fork with a Vibrant Traceability ID (VTI).
traceabilityPage.vtiDescription: A VTI is a unique identifier assigned to each batch of produce, ensuring transparency throughout the supply chain.
traceabilityPage.recentDescription: Explore some of the latest product journeys on the platform.

detailPage.loadError: Failed to load traceability history for this batch.
detailPage.notFoundDescription: The traceability report for this ID could not be found.
detailPage.journeyDescription: A chronological record of events for this batch.
detailPage.noEventDetails: No specific details for this event.
detailPage.noEventsFound: No traceability events have been logged for this batch yet.
detailPage.sustainablyGrownDescription: This product was grown using practices that align with sustainable and organic principles, based on logged inputs.

searchPage.title: Universal Search
searchPage.description: Find anything across the DamDoh platform.
searchPage.placeholder: Search people, products, services, forum posts...

modal.title: Universal Search
modal.searchErrorDescription: An error occurred while searching. Please try again.
modal.invalidCodeError: Invalid QR Code scanned. It does not appear to be a DamDoh ID.
modal.scanErrorDescription: Could not read the QR code. Please try again.
modal.interpretationNotesDefault: Searching for items related to your query.

AppFooter.tagline: The Global Agricultural Supply Chain Platform.

offline.title: You are currently offline
offline.description: Your actions will be saved and synced when you reconnect.

syncing.title: Syncing offline changes...
syncing.description: Uploading {count, plural, one {# action} other {# actions}} to the server.

synced.title: Sync Complete!
synced.description: All your offline changes have been saved.

syncFailed.title: Sync Failed
syncFailed.description: Could not sync all offline changes. Will retry later.

queued.title: Action Queued
queued.description: This action will be performed once you are online.

tooltip.syncing: Syncing {count, plural, one {# pending action} other {# pending actions}}...
tooltip.onlinePending: Online | {count, plural, one {# action} other {# actions}} pending sync
tooltip.offline: Offline | {count, plural, one {# action} other {# actions}} queued

sustainabilityPage.title: Sustainability Dashboard
sustainabilityPage.description: Track and understand the environmental impact of your agricultural practices.

auth.title: Authentication Required
auth.description: Please sign in to view your sustainability dashboard.

noData.title: No Data Available
noData.description: Start logging your farm activities to see your sustainability metrics.

Forums.description: Browse and create topics for discussion.

notFound.title: No Topics Found
notFound.beTheFirst: Be the first to create a topic.

pinning.pinnedDescription: This forum is now showing as your homepage.
pinning.unpinnedDescription: This forum will no longer show as your homepage.

errors.loadDescription: An error occurred while loading forum topics.

auth.title: Not Authenticated
auth.description: You must be logged in to create a topic.

incomplete.title: Incomplete Fields
incomplete.description: Please fill out all required fields.

form.namePlaceholder: Enter the name of your topic

success.title: Topic Created Successfully

noPosts.title: No posts yet
noPosts.description: Be the first to start the discussion.

notFound.title: Topic not found
notFound.description: The topic you are looking for does not exist.

loadPosts.title: Error loading posts
loadPosts.description: An error occurred while loading posts for this topic.

loadTopic.title: Error loading topic
loadTopic.description: An error occurred while loading the topic details.

notFound.title: Post not found
notFound.description: The post you are looking for does not exist.

loadPost.title: Error loading post
loadPost.description: An error occurred while loading the post details.

loadReplies.title: Error loading replies
loadReplies.description: An error occurred while loading replies for this post.

submitReply.title: Error submitting reply
submitReply.description: An error occurred while submitting your reply.

createPost.title: Create New Post

form.titlePlaceholder: Enter the title of your post

aiDraft.title: AI Draft Generated!
aiDraft.description: A draft has been generated for you.

incomplete.title: Incomplete Fields
incomplete.description: Please fill in all required fields.

general.title: Error

talentExchangePage.title: Talent Exchange
talentExchangePage.description: Find agricultural jobs, services, and experts.
talentExchangePage.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your search or filters. Or be the first to list a service!

error.title: Error
error.description: Could not fetch services from the talent exchange.

settingsPage.title: Settings
settingsPage.description: Manage your account and profile settings.

stakeholderProfile.title: Stakeholder Profile
stakeholderProfile.description: Your professional identity on DamDoh. This is how others see you.

account.title: Account Settings
account.description: Manage your account authentication and security.

notifications.title: Notification Settings
notifications.description: Manage your email and push notification preferences.
notifications.connectionRequestsDescription: Notify me about new connection requests.
notifications.forumMentionsDescription: Notify me when I'm mentioned or my posts are replied to.
notifications.marketplaceActivityDescription: Notify me about orders and inquiries on my listings.
notifications.talentExchangeDescription: Notify me about new job listings and applications.

privacy.title: Privacy & Visibility
privacy.description: Control who can see your information and interact with you.
privacy.profileVisibilityDescription: Control who can see your full profile.
privacy.connectionRequestsLabel: Who can send you connection requests?
privacy.connectionRequestsDescription: Limit who can send you requests to connect.
privacy.contactInfoVisibilityLabel: Who can see your contact info?
privacy.contactInfoVisibilityDescription: Control who sees your email and phone number.
privacy.activityStatusDescription: Let your connections know when you're active on DamDoh.
privacy.searchIndexingLabel: Allow search engines to index my profile
privacy.searchIndexingDescription: Allow your profile to appear in search results on Google, etc.
privacy.dataConsentDescription: Control how your data is used across DamDoh's integrated services.
privacy.marketplaceHistoryDescription: Allow financial institutions on DamDoh to consider your marketplace transaction history for credit scoring.
privacy.traceabilityDataDescription: Allow your anonymized traceability data to be used in public reports and research.
privacy.financialApplicationDataDescription: Allow your anonymized financial application data to be used by our AI to suggest relevant services.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize the look and feel of the application.
appearance.themeDescription: Select a light or dark theme for the interface.
appearance.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the application.

toast.notAuthenticatedDescription: Please sign in to edit your profile.
toast.unauthorizedDescription: You can only edit your own profile.
